titleStmt.title: The speech of Bulstrode Whitelocke esquire to the right honourable the Lords, at a conference of both Houses on Thursday the seventeenth of February last concerning the propositions then made by divers gentlemen, citizens and others, for the speedy reducing of the Kingdom of Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Whitlocke, Bulstrode, 1605-1675 or 6.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
